formalpara.title: Internal help for this AMI command in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: ZapTransfer Synopsis: Transfer Zap Channel Privilege: <none>

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,3 +1,3 @@ - Action: ZapTransfer - Synopsis: Transfer Zap Channel + Action: DAHDITransfer + Synopsis: Transfer DAHDI Channel Privilege: <none>
